title: Supreme Court Places Abortion Drug Restrictions on Hold — For Now
description:
Mifepristone will remain available until further review by the conservative 5th Circuit, which plans to hear oral arguments on May 17.

The post Supreme Court Places Abortion Drug Restrictions on Hold — For Now appeared first on The Intercept.
